The duty of a Christian towards his neighbour considered in a sermon peached upon occasion of the Huntingdonshire feast at St. Swithin's Church, London, the 24th of June, being the Feast of St. J. Baptist / by Charles Trimnell. Trimnell, Charles, 1663-1723.
[3], 24 p.
Printed for John Weld, London : 1697.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
